A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I walked out of this abomination of a film.  The Star Wars saga is dead\, and Disney killed it.  This film may have been worse than the prequels.  Once the critics realize that the fans won't support this film they'll change their tune.  Expect the critics' 93% fresh rating to plummet rapidly. Disney should cancel the third installment\, they won't because it will make money\, of course\, but it would be the morally right thing to do.
